title: Concorde
brief_description: Concerned with the background to Concorde, in particular some of the problems which occurred when designing and building an airliner for supersonic flight. Covers various aspects of the problem including: pioneering problems, airframe stresses, design, temperature problem, structure and assembly. Contains some animated sequences. Narrated by Nick Reid.
